entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
